summaries: This document is a Form 10-K Annual Report for Oracle Corporation, filed with the United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). The report covers the fiscal year ended May 31, 2025. The filing includes financial statements for Common Stock and 3.125% senior notes due July 2025. Oracle Corporation is a large accelerated filer, with an aggregate market value of $305,793,119,000 as of May 31, 2025. The number of shares of common stock outstanding as of June 13, 2025, was 2,808,833,000. Portions of the company's definitive proxy statement relating to its 2025 annual meeting of stockholders have been incorporated by reference into the report.
